"The Collab Icon":
"The Collab Icon is an icon you can use to check whether costumes, accessories, equipment and so on are permitted to be used in events such as Screenshot Submission Campaigns.

When making submissions to these events, items with the icon must not be included in your screenshot."

"The Collab Icon is displayed above the item icon in the following places:

・Item Details
・Fashion Information
・Perform Lobby Action
・Beauty Salon (item selection menus)

The icon only appears during events."
